DirectoryManagerHelper¶

DirectoryManagerHelper.create_necessary_directories(cluster_results_dir='/ClusterPlots', rand_index_visualization_dir='/RandIndexVisualization', text_file_dir='/TextFiles', data_files_dir='/ClusteredData', cluster_histogram_dir='/ClusterInfoHistograms', decon_dir='/DeconvolutionPlots', file_name='')¶
Parameters

  • cluster_results_dir – The directory to save the clustering results in

  • rand_index_visualization_dir – The directory to save the rand index visualization in

  • text_file_dir – The directory to save any text files in

  • data_files_dir – The directory to save any data files in

  • cluster_histogram_dir – The directory to save any histograms highlighting cluster fractions files in

  • decon_dir – The directory to save any deconvolution plots in

  • file_name – The name of the file we are reading in relative to the folder of the executable

Returns

The path to the directory where we are saving everything

Sets up the directories necessary for saving information while completing the clustering.

DirectoryManagerHelper.handle_dir_creation(dir_path)¶
Parameters

dir_path – The directory path to create a directory for

Returns

Nothing

Creates the specified directory. This serves as a helper function for create_necessary_directories
